comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Presumably Cyrus Hall McCormick Jr. (1859-1936): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrus_Hall_McCormick_Jr. ETA: Nope, it's his son--see Jon's message below.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca and wystan for the information. I looked into Mr. McCormick and I believe it is Cyrus McCormick Jr.'s son, Cyrus McCormick III. In other photos of McCormick Jr. from this era, he already has a white mustache. The Wisconsin Historical Society has the McCormick collection which includes some nice photos of the various family members.
